text: Albert Ferreros del Rosario (November 14, 1939 - April 18, 2023) was a Filipino politician. He was the Secretary of Foreign Affairs of the Philippines from 2011 to 2016 during the Benigno Aquino III administration. Del Rosario died on April 18, 2023 while on a flight heading towards San Francisco, California at the age of 83.Albert Del Rosario, who won Philippines' maritime case vs China, dies at 83 The cause of death was heart failure caused by cardiomyopathy. ==References== Category:2023 deaths Category:Politicians from Manila Category:1939 births
title: Albert del Rosario
